item.description:
Hi Trailblazers? Do you like to play "Apples to Apples", Backgammon or a good card game? Well, come out for an evening of playing some fun games while meeting others. We will have a potluck dinner so bring something to share.

I will be having this event every month the second Thursday of the month, so mark your calendars for this fun event!

We will be meeting at my house in Durham. My house is so new that it's not on a GPS or Mapquest but you can find my place by putting in my parents' house at: 12 Hampshire Ave, Durham. My driveway is right next to that address. It's a long dirt road, just look for a strange looking home at the end.

If you get lost give me a call at: 603-509-2907.
Please bring a chair as I am somewhat limited on these, and bring a game that you would like to play.
See you there!
Peter

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Game Night with a Potluck Dinner
